mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_RECRUMANAGE (RM_ID, RT_ID, R_ID, RM_STATE, U_ID) VALUES (T_RECRUMANAGE_SEQ.nextval,#{recruitment.rt_id},#{resumes.r_id},0,#{user.u_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE T_RECRUMANAGE SET RM_STATE=#{state} where RM_ID=#{rm_id}
mapper.select: SELECT * from T_RECRUMANAGE,T_RESUME WHERE T_RECRUMANAGE.R_ID=T_RESUME.R_ID and RM_STATE=#{state}
SELECT * from T_RECRUMANAGE,T_RECRUITMENT,T_JOB WHERE T_RECRUMANAGE.RT_ID=T_RECRUITMENT.RT_ID and T_RECRUITMENT.J_ID=T_JOB.J_ID AND U_ID=#{user.u_id} and RM_STATE=#{state}
SELECT * FROM T_RECRUMANAGE,T_RECRUITMENT,T_JOB WHERE T_RECRUMANAGE.RT_ID=T_RECRUITMENT.RT_ID and T_RECRUITMENT.J_ID=T_JOB.J_ID AND RM_ID=#{rm_id}
